pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, July 29, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Vancouver, British Columbia

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement and hold a media availability. Minister of Fisheries, Oceans and the Canadian Coast Guard Jonathan Wilkinson will be in attendance.                

Kitsilano Canadian Coast Guard base
1661 Whyte Avenue

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 11:15 a.m.

12:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a community BBQ with Kitsilano Canadian Coast Guard base workers.

Kitsilano Canadian Coast Guard base
1661 Whyte Avenue

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 11:15 a.m.
